item.title: 15 Best Holiday Tips Beyond The Packing List
item.description: We recently went on a holiday to New York. On the last day we stopped in at the Gasoline Alley coffee company and took 15 mins to write down some of the things that had helped it go smoothly. Here are our 15 best holiday tips (and here weâ€™re talking about things you can do to help enjoy your holiday, not the best ways to buy a holiday or a packing list).
